001package io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core;
002
003
004import lombok.Builder;
005import lombok.Getter;
006import lombok.Setter;
007
008/**
009 * Represents a validation rule used in test assertions.
010 *
011 * <p>This class defines the structure of an assertion, specifying what is being validated,
012 * the type of validation, the expected value, and whether it should be treated as a soft assertion.
013 * Assertions can be applied in various testing contexts, including API responses, UI elements,
014 * and database records.
015 *
016 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
017 */
018@Getter
019@SuppressWarnings("java:S3740")
020public final class Assertion {
021
022   /**
023    * The subject of the assertion, specifying what is being validated.
024    */
025   private final AssertionTarget target;
026
027   /**
028    * Provides a supplementary identifier for targeted validation.
029    */
030   @Setter
031   private String key;
032
033   /**
034    * Indicates the logical operation for this validation.
035    */
036   private final AssertionType<?> type;
037
038   /**
039    * The reference value expected by this assertion.
040    */
041   private final Object expected;
042
043   /**
044    * Determines if the assertion is a soft assertion.
045    */
046   private final boolean soft;
047
048   @Builder
049   private Assertion(AssertionTarget target,
050                     String key,
051                     AssertionType<?> type,
052                     Object expected,
053                     boolean soft) {
054
055      StringBuilder missing = new StringBuilder();
056      if (target == null) {
057         missing.append("target, ");
058      }
059      if (type == null) {
060         missing.append("type, ");
061      }
062      if (expected == null) {
063         missing.append("expected, ");
064      }
065
066      if (!missing.isEmpty()) {
067         missing.setLength(missing.length() - 2);
068         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Missing required fields: [" + missing + "]");
069      }
070
071      this.target = target;
072      this.key = key;
073      this.type = type;
074      this.expected = expected;
075      this.soft = soft;
076   }
077
078
079}
